thread.title: Japan Says It Will Work to Keep Pressure on North Korea

author: Peter Landers
title: Japan Says It Will Work to Keep Pressure on North Korea
text:
TOKYO—Japan said Friday it would continue to work with the U.S. and South Korea to pressure North Korea after President Donald Trump canceled his meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.
“What is important is not the holding of a U.S.-North Korea summit meeting per se but making such a meeting into an opportunity for progress on the nuclear and missile issues and above all the abductee issue,” a foreign ministry statement said. Japan has demanded the return of citizens it says were abducted by North Korea in the 1970s...
